metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3467 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Debian-edu-config all versions < 2.11.10, a set of configuration files used for Debian Edu, and debian-lan-config < 0.26, configured too permissive ACLs for the Kerberos admin server, which allowed password changes for other Kerberos user principals.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3467` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

debian-lan-config - 0.23+deb9u1build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: debian-lan-config package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.23+deb9u1build0.18.04.1').
